scripts.start:svg: npx ts-node src/index.ts contracts/ExampleContract1.sol -o out/Example.svg -f svg
scripts.start:png: npx ts-node src/index.ts contracts/ExampleContract1.sol -o out/Example.png -f png
scripts.start:pdf: npx ts-node src/index.ts contracts/ExampleContract1.sol -o out/Example.pdf -f pdf
scripts.start:md: npx ts-node src/index.ts contracts/ExampleContract1.sol -o out/Example.md -f md
scripts.start:mmd: npx ts-node src/index.ts contracts/ExampleContract1.sol -o out/Example.mmd -f mmd
